attributes.action: Chancellor of the Exchequer has to have proven economic/financial experience
attributes.additional_details: People who are I’ll equipped to do senior roles are making large mistakes. If our uk government were a business it would’ve been insolvent by now. There are lots of very capable people in uk industry who should’ve been considered and interviewed for the role.
attributes.background: Ensure that those people who take on the role of the chancellor of the exchequer have the qualifications and experience to do the role. Proven economic and financial experience to lead and manage the 6th largest economy in the world.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Chancellor of the Exchequer to be required to have certain qualifications or experience, but we're not sure exactly what qualifications or experience you want to be required.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
